subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: The boxer Floyd Mayweather Jr. gave his former girlfriend $200 to put under their daughter’s pillow for a lost tooth before threatening, hitting and taking a cellphone from the woman in an argument that led to a felony charge last week, according to a police arrest report.
